original_title: 平成 残 侠伝 狼 が 斬る !
overview: Hideo Sakiki, a man who once crushed a hostile organization by himself, is back. This is because the funeral of the leader who was taken care of. However, the existence of Hideo stimulates other organizations as well as dislike...
title: Heisei Zankeiden: The Wolf Slashes!
